definition: to sit astride/to ride (a horse, bike etc)/classifier for saddle horses
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: Armed with lances and encased in plate armour these loyal warriors act as retinues and bodyguards for royalty.
sentences.chinese: 男爵親衛騎兵是忠誠的貴族衛隊，裝備板甲和騎槍。

sentences.english: Supremely skilled warriors who excel in armed combat and horse riding, they are armed with a lance and mace.
sentences.chinese: 他們裝備鋒利騎槍和狼牙棒，極爲驍勇善戰。

sentences.english: Lightly armoured in leather and equipped with a hand weapon and a lance.
sentences.chinese: 這些輕槍騎兵身穿皮甲，裝備騎槍和單手短兵刃。
